data.title: Ministry of Colleges and Universities
data.meta_description: Helping you get the educationÂ you need to build a rewarding career. Ontario Student Assistance Program (OSAP)
data.text:
Helping you get the education you need to build a rewarding career.

Ontario Student Assistance Program (OSAP)

What we do

Develop policy directions for universities and colleges of applied arts and technology.

Plan and administer policies related to basic and applied research in this sector.

Authorize universities to grant degrees.

Distribute provincial funds to colleges and universities.

Provide financial assistance to postsecondary school students.

Register career colleges.

Ministry of Colleges and Universities

438 University Avenue, 5th Floor

Toronto, Ontario M7A 2A5

Employee directory

Minister, media and news

Contact the Minister

Media contacts

Ministry news

Agencies, boards and commissions

The ministry is affiliated with the following independent agencies:

Postsecondary Education Quality Assessment Board

Boards of Governors of Colleges of Applied Arts and Technology

University foundations

Legislation

The ministry administers the following legislation:

Ministry of Training, Colleges and Universities Act

Higher Education Quality Council Act

Indigenous Institutes Act

Ontario Career Colleges Act

Ontario College of Art & Design Act

Ontario College of Applied Arts and Technology Act

Post-secondary Education Choice and Excellence Act

University Expropriation Powers Act

University Foundations Act

University of Ontario Institute of Technology Act

Updated: July 24, 2024

Published: October 13, 2016
